welcome_benefits: Welcome gift voucher worth ₹500 on spending ₹5,000 or more within the first 30 days. Also, get 5% cashback on the value of your first EMI transaction done within 30 days of card generation.

Movie & Dining: Get a 25% discount on movies (up to ₹100) on the District app once per month and up to  20% discount on dining through your IDFC FIRST Classic Credit Card.
Rewards Rate: 3X Reward Points on every spend of ₹150. 10X Reward Points on each spend after reaching the monthly limit of ₹20,000
Reward Redemption: The Reward Points can be redeemed instantly for online transactions & partner stores. Here, 1 Reward Point = ₹0.25
Travel: Free Railway Lounge Access (Four Each Quarter) Unlocked After Spends of ₹20,000 Each Month
Insurance Benefits: You get a personal accident cover worth Rs. 2 Lakhs and a lost card liability cover worth up to Rs. 25,000

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver (up to Rs. 200 per statement cycle)

product_details: 3x Reward Points on every ₹150 you spent.
10x Reward Points on every ₹150 you spend on purchases above ₹20,000.
10x Reward Points on every ₹150 spent on your birthday.
The card comes with no joining/renewal fee.
Welcome benefit of a gift voucher worth ₹500 and 5% cash back on the value of your first EMI transaction
25% discount on movie tickets on the District app, up to ₹100, once per month.
4 complimentary railway lounge access every quarter.
Get free Road Side Assistance worth ₹1399
Get personal accident cover worth ₹2 Lakhs and lost card liability cover worth ₹25,000
